sentences.en: a massive effusion of poisonous gas
A sudden effusion of blood into an organ or tissue.
sentences.cn: 内出血器官或组织内的突然出血.

sentences.en: Border line heart size and tortuous aorta Lt pleural effusion is found.
sentences.cn: 心脏边缘及主动脉弓处有肋膜积水的情形.

sentences.en: Effusion, when present , is slight, and redness and warmth are usually absent.
sentences.cn: 如有渗出液,一般都很轻微.

sentences.en: His employer greeted him with an effusion of relief.
sentences.cn: 他的雇主看到他大松一口气。

sentences.en: Increased right side pleural effusion was noted during last admission.
sentences.cn: 右侧胸膜渗出增加在上次进入本院时被发现.

sentences.en: Major complications were pleural effusion, pneumonia and anastomotic leakage.
sentences.cn: 胸腔积液 、 肺部感染和吻合口漏是主要并发症.

sentences.en: Objective : To summary and analyze the present treatment of malignant pleural effusion.
sentences.cn: 目的: 总结分析恶性胸腔积液目前的治疗方法.

sentences.en: Objective: To improve the accuracy of X - ray diagnosis of subpulmonic effusion.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨肺底积液 X 线诊断的准确性.

sentences.en: Pericardial effusion is the accumulation of excess fluid around the heart.
sentences.cn: 心包积液是指心脏周围积聚了过量的液体.

sentences.en: Pleural effusion associated with retroperitoneal urinary leakage is unusual.
sentences.cn: 摘要集尿系统尿液外渗后所引起的肋膜积液,在临床上属于罕见.

sentences.en: Pleural effusion cytology was sent and showed suspicious for malignancy.
sentences.cn: 胸膜渗出细胞学被送出和显示疑似为恶性肿瘤.

sentences.en: Results Allergic alveolus inflammation can lead to pleural effusion.
sentences.cn: 结果:过敏性肺泡炎可以并发胸腔积液.

sentences.en: The report on sodium pentachlorophenol poisoning and pleural effusion is rare.
sentences.cn: 五氯酚钠中毒致胸腔积液的报道非常罕见.

sentences.en: The sensitivity of % and specificity 100 % in diagnosing malignant pleural effusion.
sentences.cn: 其对恶性胸腔积液诊断的敏感性及特异性%100%.

sentences.en: There may be ascites with unilateral or bilateral pleural effusion.
sentences.cn: 病人可能同时有腹水伴单侧或双侧胸水.

trans.tran_en: a liquid or gas that flows out of something, or the act of flowing out
